title: Featured Projects
description: Discover some of my key initiatives in environmental conservation and sustainability.

projects.title: Post Industrial Plastics Recycling Initiative
projects.description: I spearheaded post-industrial plastics recycling, diverting waste from landfills and creating high-quality recycled materials to foster a more sustainable and eco-friendly industrial environment.

projects.title: Sustainable Packaging Solutions
projects.description: Led the export of post-industrial plastics from America to global markets, supporting the circular economy and meeting the demand for recycled materials.
